pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reading Financial Reports from Bovespa's ITR System // Reads quarterly and annual financial reports including assets, liabilities, income and cash flow statements from Bovespa's ITR (informacoes trimestrais) system http://www.bmfbovespa.com.br/en_us/products/listed-equities- and-derivatives/equities/listed-companies.htm. The ITR/DFP system is a web based interface for all financial reports of companies traded at Bovespa. The package is especially designed for large scale data importation, keeping a tabular (long) structure for easier processing.
